00020 class ImageRegionsInfos {
00021         public:
00022                 ImageRegionsInfos(Image <T> &img, Image <T2> &seedRegions):imgSrc(img), seedRegions(seedRegions) {}
00023                 
00024                 //p(Ri,q)
00026                 double computeDistance(Point <TCoord> &p, Point <TCoord>  &q)
00027                         {
00028                         double moy=(double)sumIntensityRegions[(seedRegions)(p)]/nbPointsRegions[(seedRegions)(p)];
00029                         double prio=(fabs((imgSrc)(q)-moy));
00030                         //cout << "Prio: " << prio <<"\n";
00031                         return prio;
00032                         }
00033                 
00034                 double computeDistance(TOffset &p, TOffset  &q)
00035                         {
00036                         if(nbPointsRegions[(seedRegions)(p)]==0) 
00037                                 {
00038                                 std::cout << "BIG ERROR!!!\n";
00039                                 exit(1);
00040                                 }
00041                         double moy=(double)sumIntensityRegions[(seedRegions)(p)]/nbPointsRegions[(seedRegions)(p)];
00042                         double prio=(fabs((imgSrc)(q)-moy));
00043                         //cout << "Prio: " << prio <<"\n";
00044                         return prio;
00045                         }
00046                 
00047                 //Fusion model Ri=m(Ri,p)
00048                 void setPoint(Point <TCoord> &p, T2 label) 
00049                         {
00050                         (seedRegions)(p)=label;
00051                         sumIntensityRegions[label]+=(imgSrc)(p);
00052                         nbPointsRegions[label]++; 
00053                         }
00054                 
00055                 //Fusion model Ri=m(Ri,p)

00057                         {
00058                         (seedRegions)(p)=label;
00059                         sumIntensityRegions[label]+=(imgSrc)(p);
00060                         nbPointsRegions[label]++; 
00061                         }

00065

00067                         return dist;

00072                         {
00073                         
00074                         }
